arts.ttl: Oxford vs Middlesbrough predictions: Brynn in for a busy afternoon at the Kassam
arts.sum: Adi Viveash takes charge of his second game as interim Middlesbrough boss and Steve Davies foresees his side soaking up their fair share of blows at Oxford.
